attributes.action: Mandatory driving ability test every 3-5 years for drivers over 60 years old
attributes.additional_details: It’s simply dangerous to have older people on the roads. Their general abilities decline as they age and operating a car proves too difficult for most.
attributes.background: Every day without fail I have to swerve out of the way, stop etc for older drivers who are swerving between lanes, going through red lights, driving on 70mph roads going 30mph and more

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require drivers to retake their driving test at age 60.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702017
